story.text: BRUSSELS Jan 3 Belgian biotechnology company Galapagos GLPG.BR(GLPG.AS) has extended its drug discovery collaboration with U.S. group Amgen (AMGN.O), it said on Wednesday. Galapagos said it would receive an upfront fee of $2.4 million as a payment for 2007 research costs and that it would also receive payment in the form of library and technology access fees, research fees, milestone payments and bonuses.
story.title: biotechs galapagos , amgen extend collaboration
